mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT NVL(pj.project_join_no, 0) AS projectJoinNo, e.employee_id AS employeeId, e.name AS name, e.position AS position, e.department AS department, e.phone_number AS phoneNumber, e.email AS email, e.work_status AS workStatus, NVL(pj.project_no, #{projectNo}) AS projectNo, pj.in_date AS inDate, pj.up_date AS dateUp, NVL(pj.join_flag, 0) AS joinFlag, NVL(pj.manager_flag, 0) AS managerFlag FROM employees e LEFT JOIN project_join pj ON pj.employee_id = e.employee_id AND pj.project_no = #{projectNo} WHERE e.resign_date IS NULL ORDER BY CASE WHEN NVL(pj.manager_flag,0)=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, e.department ASC, e.name ASC
